5f1d7c2e-8f3a-4d2b-b5c6-9a1e7f8d2c3b.title: Vitosha Mountain
5f1d7c2e-8f3a-4d2b-b5c6-9a1e7f8d2c3b.description: One of the most popular destinations near Sofia. Offers scenic trails, cozy huts, and breathtaking views throughout the year.

6a2b8e3f-1d4c-4f5e-9a7b-2c3d4e5f6g7h.title: Nessebar Old Town
6a2b8e3f-1d4c-4f5e-9a7b-2c3d4e5f6g7h.description: UNESCO heritage site with cobblestone streets, historic churches, and stunning seaside views.

7b3c9f4g-2e5d-5g6f-0b8c-3d4e5f6g7h8i.title: Seven Rila Lakes
7b3c9f4g-2e5d-5g6f-0b8c-3d4e5f6g7h8i.description: A must-visit natural landmark in Rila Mountain. The seven glacial lakes offer spectacular hiking and photography opportunities.

8c4d0g5h-3f6e-6h7g-1c9d-4e5f6g7h8i9j.title: Buzludzha Monument
8c4d0g5h-3f6e-6h7g-1c9d-4e5f6g7h8i9j.description: Abandoned futuristic monument in the Stara Planina mountains. Popular for photography and urban exploration.

9d5e1h6i-4g7f-7i8h-2d0e-5f6g7h8i9j0k.title: Plovdiv Old Town
9d5e1h6i-4g7f-7i8h-2d0e-5f6g7h8i9j0k.description: Historic center of Plovdiv with colorful houses, Roman theaters, and a vibrant cultural scene.

0e6f2i7j-5h8g-8j9i-3e1f-6g7h8i9j0k1l.title: Pirin National Park
0e6f2i7j-5h8g-8j9i-3e1f-6g7h8i9j0k1l.description: A paradise for hikers and nature lovers. Stunning peaks, alpine lakes, and rich flora and fauna.

a1b2c3d4-5e6f-7g8h-9i0j-1k2l3m4n5o6p.text: Great place for a weekend walk. Trails are well marked and easy for beginners.

b2c3d4e5-6f7g-8h9i-0j1k-2l3m4n5o6p7q.text: Amazing views at the Seven Rila Lakes. Bring good hiking shoes!

c3d4e5f6-7g8h-9i0j-1k2l-3m4n5o6p7q8r.text: Lovely historical town, a must-see for history lovers.

d4e5f6g7-8h9i-0j1k-2l3m-4n5o6p7q8r9s.text: A bit eerie but very photogenic. The architecture is unique.

e5f6g7h8-9i0j-1k2l-3m4n-5o6p7q8r9s0t.text: Beautiful old town with charming streets and amazing local cafes.

f6g7h8i9-0j1k-2l3m-4n5o-6p7q8r9s0t1u.text: Hiking here is refreshing, and the views of Pirin peaks are breathtaking.
